sentences.en: For flash photography, set the aperture at f.5.6.
sentences.cn: 用闪光照相，要把光圈孔径定为5.6。

sentences.en: He did fashion photography for ‘Vogue’ magazine.
sentences.cn: 他为《时尚》杂志拍过时装照片。

sentences.en: He is a keen outdoors man with a great interest in photography and walking.
sentences.cn: 他非常喜欢户外运动,酷爱摄影和徒步旅行.

sentences.en: His interest in photography is only a passing fad.
sentences.cn: 他对摄影的兴趣只是一时的爱好罢了.

sentences.en: I have a large circle of friends and acquaintances engaged in photography.
I wish I'd discovered photography when I was younger.
sentences.cn: 我要是早点接触到摄影技术就好了。

sentences.en: My hobbies are letter writing, foot-ball, music, photography, and tennis.
sentences.cn: 我的业余爱好是写信、踢足球、听音乐、玩摄影和打网球。

sentences.en: Paul is self-taught and became interested in photography just four years ago.
sentences.cn: 保罗是自学的，他四年前才开始对摄影产生兴趣。

sentences.en: Photography is not taught in our school.
Photography is one of her hobbies.
Photography is strictly forbidden in the museum.
The close-up photography and commentary are clear and unambiguous.
sentences.cn: 那组特写照片和附带的评论一目了然，毫无含糊之处。

sentences.en: There are satellites that supply high - resolution photography.
sentences.cn: 有些卫星能提供 高分辨率 的摄影图像.

sentences.en: Trick photography is one of his hobbies.
sentences.cn: 特技摄影是他的爱好之一.

sentences.en: When it comes to photography, I'm not an adept.
sentences.cn: 要说照相, 我不是内行.

sentences.en: Where the show really excites is in the display of avant-garde photography.
sentences.cn: 那场展览真正令人激动的就是先锋派摄影的展示。

words.tran_cn: 上照的；适于摄影的；由光导致的
摄影的；逼真的；（尤指记忆）详细准确的
摄影报道，摄影新闻工作

phrases.tran_cn: n. 空中摄影；空中照相术
彩色摄影；彩色相片；彩色照相术

trans.tran_en: the art, profession, or method of producing photographs or the scenes in films
